anfrss.gui package

Submodules

anfrss.gui.guiapp module

The run() - Function is the main function. It is also imported by the __init__ so it can be used by the __main__ of the package.

class anfrss.gui.guiapp.ArticleWidget(*args)

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget

Article Widget

This widget is holding a :class: QTextEdit as read-only, so there is no edit enabled for the User.

initUi()

Defines UI of the :class: ArticleWidget

The Layout is a :class: QVBoxLayout

There is a :class: QLabel over the Text Box

Central Widget of this class is the :class: QTextEdit

  • Read-onldy so user can not change or delete text by acci- dent

  • Font is set to: Times, and size 12

Text to the QTextEdit is added in the :class: ANFApp:

It catches the signal if a title is clicked and appends the:

  • Summary of the

    content

  • Link of the article

  • The article (just

    text, no pictures etc.)

class anfrss.gui.guiapp.TitleWidget(*args)

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget

Title Widget

This widget is presenting the Feed titles of the :class: ANFFeed ; It is also containing a :class: pyqtSignal on double click which will be responsible to present the linked feed in the :class: ArticleWidget

TitleClicked
initUi()

Defines UI of the :class: TitleWidget

The structure of this Widget:

The Layout is a :class: QVBoxLayout

Class

QLabel

Class

QListWidget

newsFeed(language=None)

Set ANF Feeds

Class

ANFFeed

This method is interacting with the :class: ANFFeed It is getting the RSS Feeds and is representing the Titles of each Feed. Furthermore, it is changing the language if the User is interacting with the “Language” option of the Menu.

-> See more in the :class: ANFApp

Parameters

language (str, optional) – The language to be set (The ANFFeed is setting to English by default) Default here is None, so it is able to track if a language was chosen by the User or not

onClicked(item)

Emit Content

This method will be called on double click on one of the titles. Depending on the Title clicked on, it gets the Summary, Link and the article’s text. After the pyqtSignal TitleClicked is emitting the content.

Parameters

item (PyQt Obj) – Item contained by the article clicked on

class anfrss.gui.guiapp.ANFApp(*args)

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Main Window

All other Widgets and Elements are organized.

General Layout:

  • QStatusBar

  • QSplitter()

    • TitleWidget

anfInit()

Defines UI of the

Class

ANFApp (Main Window)

Both, the Article and the Title Widget are organized inside :class: QSplitter Moreover there is: :class: QMenuBar :class: QPushButton

(Exit Button)

languageAction(lang)

Change Language

Changing the Language of the Feeds if Menu Option is hovered.

Parameters

lang (PyQt obj) – The Language Text given by Menu Option

title_click(feed)

Signal Catcher

Catches the Slot Signal of the :class: TitleWidget and sets the Text for the :class: ArticleWidget;

Parameters

feed – The Signal in the TitleWidget emits a list with the contents;

type feed: list

exit()

Exit the Application

anfrss.gui.guiapp.run(*args)

Run the App

Default Style is set to “Breeze”
